body.name: Home Hero 2 Pcs Utility Knife with Sheath - High Carbon Stainless Steel Kitchen Knife with Ergonomic Handle - Razor Sharp Multipurpose Chopping Knife (Stainless Steel 5-Inch Utility Knife)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 42 mins
features: 5" Ultra-Sharp Blade with Protective Sheath - The Home Hero utility knife with a 5-inch blade is specially designed for dicing all types of fruits and veggies, and effortlessly removing fat or sinew from meat. The included sheath helps keep it in mint condition!

Nonstick Coated Blade - Our utility knife comes with a unique nonstick coating that prevents food from sticking to it to make cutting smoother and faster. The durable stainless steel blades can be handwashed for a spotless clean. To preserve its sharpness, wash the knife only by hand.

Rust-Resistant & Stainless Steel Blade - Unlike poor quality kitchen knives that crack & chip after only a few uses, our utility knife is built to last. The sturdy 1.2mm stainless steel blade is rust-resistant, and the solid polypropylene handle is coated in protective TPR.

The Perfect Chef's Gift - Home Hero's 5-inch Utility Knife is your MVP kitchen tool! This multipurpose utility knife is the ideal cooking accessory for your kitchen needs. It also makes a great gift for novice and professional chefs alike!

Superb Quality - HomeHero offers the perfect combination of quality, longevity, and affordability in every product, crafted to precision. Whether you are an experienced chef or a beginner, our utility knife will allow you to cook effortlessly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Durable and Long Lasting This blade is incredibly durable and long-lasting. It offers resistance to stains and corrosion, and its sharp edge makes slicing easy. Ergonomic Handle The ergonomically designed handle provides superior grip, control, and comfort, allowing for effortless cutting and minimal hand fatigue. Protective Sheath Included This knife comes with a protective sheath designed to preserve the blade while in storage and ensure long-term performance. Great Gift This premium-quality kitchen tool is versatile and essential for any cook's repertoire. An ideal present for any celebration or special occasion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice knife, good steel, comes very sharp
reviews.reviewText: Very reasonably priced for a vg10 core+damascus cladding. Ergonomics are pretty decent, and it seems to be quite solidly built. The weight was a little heavy and was expecting it to be a bit thinner as it's for slicing veggies. But... it chops really well, and comes super sharp out of the box. The only knocks I can give it, are it's a bit heavier, and the wood choice on the handle seems a bit cheap, but in the end, it's a knife, and it's meant to cut, and it does so very well. No more accordian peeling bits apart after cutting veggies because the blade is flat when it hits the cutting board. It was nice that it came with a plastic blade guard too, so if you store it in a drawer its safe, and keeps the blade sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very nice, VG10 laminated-blade Damascus-style santoku knife. Good balance, good handle, super sharp out of the box.The layering looks nice, comparable to Shun. VG10 knives have a hard, tenacious alloy steel center layer, for edge holding ability. The layered Damascus pattern is mostly for looks, the magic is really in the steel metallurgy and the tempering. I was pleasantly surprised, I did not expect much for the inexpensive price, and the silly brand name. The core steel looks and feels comparable to some of the well-known brand VG10 knives which are priced at 3-4x. These knives are not for cutting frozen stuff, the edge is so hard that it may chip..but they are perfect for vegetables or meats, It has some heft to it, and it is a bit short to serve as your main chef knife, but it will find a role in your kitchen. The price is usually less for shorter knives, you are paying for the amount of VG10 core you get.Of course I have to see how it holds up (how long it keeps a good edge when in use)Will post an update when I have and idea. I have several VG10 and SG2 knives, so it will be easy to see how this compares.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good for price & overall quality knives, ordered paring, utility & nakiri so far
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Are you home cook looking for good quality knives at reasonable price? If so try these out. You can easily pay 5-10x as much for good quality knives & while theyre not quite as good as top of the line professional knifes that are several hundred each they are more than adequate for home use.Ordered paring 1st have never really been happy with the quality of the paring knives I've had and always liked the looks of Damascus so decided to get while the price was $15 due to prime days deal. It's sharp, handle is good size for me and has mosaic pin in it, overall very good quality knife for the price. After liking Japanese paring so much I also ordered Japanese utility, same as paring it was sharp, looked good.Both became the 2 most used knives I have and have held up well so decided to order the nakiri. So far is great another sharp, goid quality for the price knife that looks cool. Honestly the santoku or chefs knife probably would of been a better choice as they can do the job a nakiri can as well as others but I just liked the looks of the nakiri and don't have one yet & have other chef/santoku (although not as good quality ) already. May very well end up ordering them especially the santoku later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty darn sharp, but I've used sharper
reviews.reviewText: It seems to dull fast, that's my only complaint, everything else is 5 stars!! E.g looks, comfort, inc cover etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kitchen knife!
reviews.reviewText: This is my preferred size for an all around kitchen knife. The blade is very sharp and it is easy to handle for slicing and chopping. I have large hands so if I could improve it I would make the handle a bit more massive for better grip. Also the distance from the grip to the base of the blade is quite close and twice now I have sliced my thumb when adjusting my grip. I think it is just a matter of my getting used to what I am working with, and I still reach for this knife every time I can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife for normal food prep
reviews.reviewText: I am not a professional chef, and don’t even do a lot of food prep. I purchased this for cutting up fruits and chicken. Works very well for me. For the price point, I consider this to be an excellent knife. Stays sharp even after repeated use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love it but hate I was lied to
reviews.reviewText: This is NOT a Damascus knife, very easy to tell just by looking at the choil and heel. Feels so good in the hand, nice heavy balanced feeling. Razor sharp out of the box. Great shape for function, but NOT Damascus, very sad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and very sharp
reviews.reviewText: This is a great deal for a good knife. Very sharp and seems to hold its edge very well.

reviews.reviewTitle: A bargain in an all-around kitchen knife!- Updated
reviews.reviewText: The VG10 blade isan excellent stainless steel, and while I found my 9 inch knife a little to long for all the common jobs, the 7 inch blade in this knife is more manoeuvrable and easier to work with, I find.The blade is indeed razor-sharp and easily slices through meats and veggies without effort.For the price I think it's just perfect, especially with the VG10 blade... Very pleased!Edit: Been using this knife for about 2 months now and it is still razor sharp.I wanted to mention how nice the handle is, gently contured to fit your hand. Very comfortable to hold, and the wood is especially nice. A great knife!

In Bezug auf Verarbeitung und Schnitt absolute Oberklasse. Toll austariert lässt es sich mit diesem Messer wie ein Profi schneiden, die Klinge kann sehr gut nachgeschärft werden, dazu muss man natürlich etwas vorsichtig sein und man braucht etwas Übung.Ich schärfe seit Jahren meine Messer selbst und ziehe sie hinterher am Leder ab, so erreiche ich eine super Klinge. Dieses Messer ist jeden Cent wert!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size and weight to it. Arrives sharp, nice design and handle feels well made & easy to manoeuvre.
Bought it for my son. He really likes it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this knife nice and sharp cuts all meats easily and looks good too. Comes in nice presentation box.
